function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Medical beds reaching full capacity leading to a large-scale outbreak","Impact":"Medical system collapse and large-scale outbreak","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce pressure on the medical system","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote patient monitoring","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government"},{"Description":"Epidemic spreading to pre-intervention levels after a short period of containment","Impact":"Re-emergence of large-scale outbreak","Mitigation":"Implement additional effective measures to reduce epidemic spread","Technologies":"Contact tracing, testing, vaccination","People":"Patients, general public","Owner":"Public health authorities, government"}]}
